system.description: You can enter any normal plant (Medium or larger) and pass any distance to a plant of the same kind in a single round. The entry and destination plants must be alive. You can bring objects up to your maximum load and one willing Medium or smaller creature (or equivalent) per three caster levels. All creatures must be in contact with one another and at least one in contact with you. You can't use this spell to travel through plant creatures. Destruction of an occupied plant slays you and any creatures brought along.
system.target: You and touched objects or touched willing creatures
